name: GST Summary Report
query:
SELECT
    gst.tax_type AS "Tax Type:Data:120",
    gst.rate AS "Rate (%%):Percent:100",
    SUM(gst.amount) AS "Tax Amount:Currency:150"
FROM `tabInvoice GST` gst
INNER JOIN `tabInvoice` inv
    ON inv.name = gst.parent
WHERE inv.docstatus = 1
  AND inv.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
GROUP BY gst.tax_type, gst.rate
ORDER BY gst.tax_type, gst.rate;
